title: Artificial Intelligence for K-12 teachers: IIT Madras expands SWAYAM AI courses for educators
description: IIT Madras expands its ‘AI For All’ courses for K-12 teachers across India, offering essential AI skills to enhance teaching. Enroll free online via SWAYAM Plus before October 10 and explore diverse AI topics tailored for educators.
content: The tech institute is providing other AI courses, including AI in Physics, AI in Chemistry, AI in Accounting, Cricket Analytics with AI, and AI/ML using Python. IIT Madras is now introducing a new course – AI for Educators – with a special focus on K... [1649 chars]

title: Confluent Names Stephen Deasy as Chief Technology Officer
description: Confluent announced the appointment of Stephen Deasy as its Chief Technology Officer on Tuesday. Deasy will lead the company’s engineering strategy and execution, with a focus on scaling its data streaming platform for artificial intelligence and real-time applications.
content:

title: Ottawa drafting public registry of AI projects as tech spreads through government
description: OTTAWA — The federal government says it plans to launch a public registry to keep Canadians in the loop on its growing use of artificial intelligence.
content:
OTTAWA — The federal government says it plans to launch a public registry to keep Canadians in the loop on its growing use of artificial intelligence.

title: AI 'Revolution Is Here'-287 S&P 500 Firms Cite Artificial Intelligence On Earnings Calls In Q2
description: AI mentions in S&P 500 earnings calls hit a record 287 in Q2, sparking a fierce debate among analysts on an AI bubble vs. a true revolution.
content:
The artificial intelligence revolution is undeniable, with AI mentions in S&P 500 earnings calls skyrocketing to an all-time high of 287 in the second quarter of 2025.
Check out the AI-linked ETF IYM’s price over here.

title: How AI and Automation Are Shaping the Future of Debt Management
description: The landscape of debt management is undergoing a significant transformation, moving away from traditional, often intrusive methods towards more sophisticated, empathetic, and efficient strategies.  At the heart of this evolution is the increasing integration of technology: artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning (ML), and automation. title: A Quarter of Australians 'admit to using artificial intelligence on CVs and cover letters'
description: Catherine Kennedy, NSW Managing Director at people2people Recruitment:  Artificial intelligence is fast becoming a tool of choice for job seekers...
content:
Generationally, AI use during the job search is highest among:
• Gen X (33%)
• Millennials/Gen Z (24%)
• Baby Boomers (22%)
But while AI promises efficiency, it is also raising concerns about honesty in applications. The research found:

title: Semiconductor equipment billings in Taiwan to double this year: SEMI
description: Semiconductor equipment billings in Taiwan are expected to double this year, as manufacturers in the industry are keen to expand production to meet strong global demand for artificial intelligence applications, which represents companies in the electronics manufacturing and design supply chain, as per a report by Focus Taiwan.
